website_summaries.verdict: GMO-free, organic, freshly grown vegetables; grown indoors. We love the larger size and ability to grow things beyond small herbs.
pros: Can quickly grow a wide variety of herbs, vegetables, or flowers
Uses an easy-to-follow touchscreen that makes it virtually error proof
cons: The higher price tag makes it a poor choice for those on a tight budget

customer_reviews.title: Warning..Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it I just loved it! I got 2 full harvests of wonderful herbs that I used fresh and also dehydrated for future use. Then one morning after having it less than 10 months it stopped working....no light and no pump to circulate the water. The documents that came with it indicated it had a 1 year factory warranty, so I emailed the company. I received NO response. I am hard of hearing so phoning was not something that I usually do. I emailed a second time as well as putting a very poor review on their website. I have still not heard from AeroGarden!!! I guess they just ignore their customer with broken products.
customer_reviews.author: IntrepidTraveler

customer_reviews.title: It's DEAD at less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Mine just DIED. Literally - DEAD. NO light, NO water running, NO LED readout - DEAD. Less than a year old and in the middle of my Pepper grow DEAD. We'll see what they do - I've contacted Aerogarden about this issue but that won't save the 8 good size peppers that are a few weeks away from being harvested. Huge disappointment! Still NO REPLY ... to my queries on what they will do to honor their warranty. Mighty expensive Paperweight!
customer_reviews.author: Sister

customer_reviews.title: Great - until the front display burns out and the company won't replace/fix after only 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is great - until the front digital display goes dim/burns out, so it's unusable. Aerogrow only has a 30 day warranty and won't help me (and btw, won't issue refund or warranty for something NOT purchased on their site), and Amazon says the same. So now I'm stuck with a $150 foot bath. You can't program it, you can't change the light schedule, you can't see when it prompts to add nutrients/water, nothing. Without the display, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Laxidaisy

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: worthless. this piece of junk lost power just out of warranty. I approached the company who simply did not respond to further emails, inquiries. Worthless product, bad company service. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: LED went right after warranty and replacment cost is insane
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother purchasing. We used our garden for only a couple of months and LED panel started flashing to be replaced. Called areo and with a 50% off code (because it was just out of the 1 year warranty period) they would send me another hood for $51.98
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Check out my photo, that is less than 20 days from planting them. Setup is extremely easy and you can see results in just a few days (they grow so fast that one day there will be 2mm and the next they will be 1inch). This is magic and I'd say the plants are fake except I've eaten them and they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Gomes

customer_reviews.title: No power - damaged board
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it never powered up. And because I shipped it overseas, I could not return it. So, wasted money. I opened the cover and found the board scratched/cut. I will try to fix it and see if it works. This is a clear quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: Abadi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy that I purchased this to grow indoor peppers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy that I purchased this to grow indoor peppers. Only downside is if you lose power. The system will not turn back on. It will remember the number of days the system was on but the lights have to be manually set on again as well as the clock. Big downside if you go on vacation for a week! This needs to be changed!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Dead out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 5 gardens in a row. And sent them all back. The screen was either loose or didn't come on. Call me a glutton for punishment to order this piece of junk this many times!!! I'm done!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garden, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The transformer in the lamp assembly failed one day. AeroGarden quickly shipped me a whole replacement free of charge (as in entire garden new in box with a fresh herb set). I eventually replaced the transformer with an external one that I wired in (runs better, too, as it's not subject to the heat from the lamp itself). For those interested, here is the part: Minger Power Supply 24V 6A Power Adapter Transformer Now I have two running gardens, with a little bit of elbow grease
customer_reviews.author: BusaSpectre

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working just after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 year and 6 months before it just died all of a sudden. LED panel went dark and the overhead light no longer comes on. Since it is now 6 months out of warranty we are left with a useless plastic box and the difficult task of trying to rescue our herb plants and somehow get them out of the Aerogarden and into soil. For such a costly piece of equipment, I would have expected it to last longer than it did or at the very least provide a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Eqbrat

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty geeked after receiving the product. On the positive side, it was easy to setup. However, after less than 24 hours, I went to check on it and the display was a digital mess. The only clear item was the water icon. I pressed on the icon to check the water and hopefully reset the display and the screen went completely blank/blue. I tried everything I could think of to get it working again (no option except to press on the display or power-cycle the entire unit) without success. This product is not valuable without a working monitor.
customer_reviews.author: KDe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 1 batch of herbs, worked well. Went to replant a year later, touch screen was blank. Called for service, was told tough luck, out of warranty. So I paid $200 for about $15 worth of herbs. NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: onetermandout

customer_reviews.title: STOP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you can tolerate having just 2 of 9 germination rate for salad greens then you would like this. But if I had read all of the reviews prior to purchasing this it would have saved me a lot of trouble, I actually bought 3 gardens and have returned them all. Aerogarden's customer service is also a reason to avoid this product. I bought my seed pod kits directly from them and just to get an RMA is difficult to stop the marketing gab from them is difficult but they have had the returns in their possession for nearly a week and have yet to process them. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made - company refuses to help or replace
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this. It was really fun growing herbs and lettuce, and then peppers and tomatoes. However, the lights in the hood started flashing, creating this crazy strobe effect, after about 8 months of owning it (not 8 months of continuous use). When I emailed customer service they refused to stand behind their product and told me I need to buy a new hood for $169.95. What a joke. And a very expensive one, at that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chap

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hydro garden. You can grow anything... And yes that two.
customer_reviews.text: I have several AGs. I love them. This one looks nice and upscale with the chrome finish. I am growing green peppers and a couple spicy ones as well.. it's suggested one large plant per garden... Two to three if you really know how to maintenance them. Perfect for all nine pods for lettuce and herbs. . u can also use your own seeds. I buy rapid rooters as the grow medium instead of ordering their grow anything kit. I have grown many things in my AGs. I need about three more of these !!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Flashes on and off
customer_reviews.text: While setting up, the device turned off and then started flashing on and off. Tried different outlets, same response. Will not restart, and plugging and unplugging parts have not worked. Overall, has not worked at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for 2 + years
customer_reviews.text: The Aerogarden Bounty worked great for almost 3 years. Around the 2nd year the graphic interface screen started showing different colored lines through it. It was still readable and I could live with it. A couple of weeks ago the light hood started flickering like a strobe light. This now makes it unusable. I contacted support and they told me that there is only a one year warranty and I would have to purchase a new hood light for about $100 including shipping. Bottom line... In my opinion..If you buy one you can only expect it to last 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: PetraNet

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I got this model and another Miracle-Go Aero Garden model in February. By June BOTH have stopped working. The light up screen on the front of teh Ultra LED does not work anymore. I'm so disappointed in both of these Miracle-Gro AeroGardens and will never by another Miracle-Gro product again.
customer_reviews.author: Hig

customer_reviews.title: im having the same problem bought it in dec 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: im having the same problem bought it in dec 2017 quit working 2 days ago feb 2018 had it just a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: jerry white

customer_reviews.title: Arrived today, touchscreen unresponsive. Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.text: Got a lemon right out of the box! And no, not because it was growing them! The touch screen shows the buttons nice and bright---button will not respond under any circumstances. Calling Customer Service tomorrow to see what recourse I have.
customer_reviews.author: Loud and opinionated

customer_reviews.title: Perfect indoor garden
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Purchased for my wife for Christmas so she can garden through the winter (we live in Idaho). Today is the 47th day since she started with the herb pods that were included. The growth is amazing and the lamp is already adjusted to its maximum height. She is transplanting them to pots with dirt so she can start another garden I have included a picture, in the picture you can see a portion of a standard LP record cover on the left to give you scale.
customer_reviews.author: S Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just read the bad reviews to see if there is a problem like mine. There are several. My unit is 19 months old. I have used it about 12 months. As of today it is completely dead. Very disappointed. A lot of money for such a short lifespan. I have contacted customer service but don't expect much help or resolve.
customer_reviews.author: James Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Non existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 6 pod unit. half the pods never sprouted, in spite of following directions to the letter. For each of the last 7 days, I’ve spent between 35 and 90 minutes on hold, trying to reach customer service with no success. Unit itself works fine and seems well made. Love to return this thing but all literature says “Just give us a call!” Good luck with that!
customer_reviews.author: St

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: About 2 weeks in, everything is growing nicely, power went out while we were on vacation and when it came back on the machine reset itself and kept working saving the sprouts. Very bright, can't keep it in a room you plan to sleep in, and it reflect off of marble or granite making the screen harder to read. Even with all that would buy it again! Can't wait to try fresh Herbs in some Cold Process Soaps! 2 of the pods did not sprout, the company says they will replace it but we bought a few extra to begin with so just popped in the new ones and they sprouted pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Pedsdoc

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week. Then the lights started strobing like crazy and is unfixable. After spending this much money I cant even believe it, what a piece of garbage, clearly they have no quality control. And all my new plants are going to die. Just great...
customer_reviews.author: Josh Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate design for expensive failure
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product at first. It works well for indoor planting and seemed like it would hold up. Then, after using it for a season and a half, it just stopped... turns out there is a fuse soldered (read as intentionally unreplaceable) onto the board that had blown, but when I called support they offered to sell me a new device “discounted” to the same price it sells for here! Terrible customer service and a product designed to fail when it could be repairable for a few cents difference.
customer_reviews.author: compuparker86

customer_reviews.title: I love this concept
customer_reviews.text: I love this concept, and how it reminds me to feed it, etc. Don't rely on the water alarm, though....if it goes off, you water has been low for a time and the plants don't like it. Couldn't be more pleased with this product, and I've been an outdoor gardener for over 50 years. THIS winter, I'll have fresh tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: sharon burton

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed with the first one
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in! Unboxed it, got it assembled, plugged it in, and then the touch screen wouldn’t work! Returning it immediately as I’ve read horror story reviews on dealing with the warranty! May reorder and try again, but disappointed with the first one...
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little machine...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I am not a green thumb whatsoever but having this gizmo makes growing tomatoes a snap. I absolutely love this. I kept track of my progress and sent weekly updates to my mom. She loved the flexibility to growing her herbs, flowers, peppers indoors so much I bought her one for Christmas. Now it’s her turn to send me pictures of her garden :) This is how great my cherry tomatoes have grown so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic☺️

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy it so far
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of having fresh picked herbs for cooking but I'm a bachelor with a black thumb. Enter the AeroGarden. It takes all the variables out of maintaining a "garden". Just pour water and nutrients in when it tells you to. Even I can do that. One caveat... the LED grow lights are BRIGHT. Like "X-Files alien abduction light pouring through your windows" bright. I highly recommend getting the "grow light boosters" add-on as it tastefully blocks a lot of the light and makes your plants grow faster at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yager III

customer_reviews.title: LED hood dies within 2.5 years and 100$ to replace
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and both of the LED hoods stopped working at the 2.5 yr mark. About gave me a heart attack. Woke up to strobe light flashing like the smoke alarms do! Thought the house was on fire or something. Contacted Aerogarden and of course I can spend another 100$ to get another hood itself but that is all they will do. I am hard of hearing, hoods have to be ordered over the phone and CANT be done online. I was told to call an interpreting line to have them order for me. I will NOT be buying another. Trying to sell 9 of them for parts now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reichman

customer_reviews.title: Incredible machine, except for the seed pack
customer_reviews.text: The machine looks incredible, but the seed pack should have failed quality control. Instead of a Dill plant, I got a Tomato plant, which they recommend not growing at the same time as herbs. Also, there was only 6 domes in a 9-plants pack, thus I had to improvise temporary domes for the missing 3. Overall, the design looks good, I was surprised by the quality of the touch screen and the overall quality of the machine. It's also totally fool-proof, takes a few minutes from the box to a working setup. Just plug it and follow instructions on the screen!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Fauteux

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor garden concept
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice concept. My wife enjoys watching their growth daily. Although, her garden never looks as good as the one pictured. They all grow at different rates and some of the pods never start growing at all. She thought that they would grow quicker under the heat lamp, but they grow about the same rate as in her outdoor garden.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pappernek

customer_reviews.title: For the cost it has an unacceptably short life.
customer_reviews.text: Did about 6 different aerogarden pod kits. Would take time off in between. Went to start a new kit and nothing works. Not the pump. Not the light. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Anywone can grow with one of these
customer_reviews.text: Bought for frustrated husband who wanted to grow some vegetables but had abysmal results. He really likes it and was amazed at how quickly the plants germinate and grow. My daughter, who cooks a lot, uses one for fresh herbs. They are fun, useful, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This was supposed to be the answer to growing strawberries better..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I had the lower end model. This was supposed to be the answer to growing strawberries better... the strawberry planter doesn't even fit on it. Called support and went through some lame trials, but nothing worked. Wanted it to work... :-(
customer_reviews.author: BorgX

customer_reviews.title: Wife Approved Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a Gold Box deal as a Christmas present for wife. She has the smaller version already. She's pretty pleased with the ability to grow a larger variety of herbs. Fresh ingredients always make home cooking even better. It sits on a small table in our breakfast nook. Originally the light interfered with our TV watching in the next room. This thing is flippin bright! With its easy to set controls, we now have it set to come on in the early AM and be off when we settle in for TV time. Also is a great nightlight when I come down to raid the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter for hydroponics
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing it's dummy proof but expensive though. I bought the farm Bounty and harvest to start .It has got me started, now I should be able to build my own hydroponic system, add a couple of timers and make my own system completely automatic and work just as well. If you want one I would suggest the farm but if you didn't want to sink that much into it the Bounty is probably the best way to go.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Received the incorrect color at first (box was labeled as stainless but product was black plastic) and returned. Received the correct product today after returning the wrong color. This was incredibly easy to set up but will update as the growing process continues. Only issue was with creating an account via the app. The confirmation number was received very long after sending for confirmation. I suggest creating an account from a browser on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a new / young / clone gardener.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to function as advertised. Cheap plastic trim and shroud / hood / water base. Electronics work and are easy to follow. Perfect for a new / young gardener. It would also be an ideal clone nursery, includes nuitrient supplements, the light is bright and it has an automatic watering system. I paid $230 for Amazon...not sure what merits the $100 price increase since i bought mine two months ago... Its worth the $200-$250 range...not worth $300-$350 range. At that price you can get the stainless steel version or buy it from another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Invictuz

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love gardening and since moving to a colder climate 5 years ago, I really miss spending time with plants. This arrived yesterday and was so easy to set up. You do not need prior experience with hydroponics to be able to use this. I'm starting with the herb seeds that came with it to get familiar with it and then I'm already planning what to grow next. I have it on the island in my kitchen and it brings a nice bit of sunshine inside. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this with the pods that came with it, but I'm disappointed. I've followed the instructions to a T but the plants that did sprout (5 out of 7) are sickly. I've removed the dying portions but still it continues. It's NOT the lush growth featured by a long shot. I've given it three stars only because the mechanics seem to perform as advertised. I'm going to try a single crop next to see if I can get enough of anything to eat; maybe tomatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great device until the screen burns out.....Burned out after 9 months. Luckily support replaced the entire unit without any issue in spite of me having it for 2.5 years. I have grown many things in this Aerogarden with almost 100% germination. The ones that didnt germinate I'm very confident there was something wrong with the seeds. For the crops that it has grown it has provided very large amounts of food. I'm beginning to germinate flowers during the winter to save on spring garden flowering and its going really well. I love this thing so much I think I will get a second quite soon.
customer_reviews.author: Oisin Mcguigan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Within the first hour of setting up my Aerogarden, the power on the unit kept shorting out. When I tried to exchange on Amazon, the only option is contact the manufacturer. I hadn't even had it 24 hours yet! I will be selecting option B for full refund of the item with no intent to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Marie

customer_reviews.title: The ability to see the water "gauge" and the nutrient feed timer is great - also to reset the timer and set up ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a month. I upgraded from a 3-pod system and the most beneficial aspect of this aerogarden is the touchscreen. The ability to see the water "gauge" and the nutrient feed timer is great - also to reset the timer and set up the clock. The only thing I wish this aerogarden could provide is the ability to recall the clock if the power goes out. It's not a big deal to reset it but it is a bit of an annoyance. Other than that, all the pods that came with the kit grew and are at a level in which harvesting is ample.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love this AeroGarden
customer_reviews.text: I love this AeroGarden. I have planted herbs that I would usually have to go to the grocery store and purchase fresh. Alot of the recipes I make call for small amounts of fresh herbs. The ones in the store are expensive. A lot of the time the grocery stores around me are out of the ones I use most. All I have to do now is go pick what I need, no pesticides. I live in New England and love fresh vegetables and herbs, now I can just grow them inside for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low maintenance dream!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me, and it's always been my dream to have an in-kitchen herb garden. Fresh herbs with every meal! It's fantastic. The directions were straight forward and easy to follow, the thing will tell my phone when it needs water or drops of liquid plant food. It's really convenient. My only criticism is that it's an eye sore. The plants get too tall (the light can be adjusted for height) that it won't fit under my cupboards, but having it out on the kitchen breakfast bar just looks so blunt. Man... worth it for fresh basil in my omelettes though, I can tell you that!
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy

customer_reviews.title: I love the machine, I just wish it came with more seed kits to start you off and try more options.
customer_reviews.text: I love the item. However I had to buy it 3 times. The first two times it was broken. First the digital screen was all white, second the grow light would not come on, but third time was the charm I suppose. After that then it has been working great. Its easy to grow things, it does all the work for you and all you have to do is keep water and food in it when it tells you to. Also perfect for starting your own seeds of whatever you may be interested. I wish it came with more seed kits though, as they can be kinda pricey especially after spending so much on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S.

customer_reviews.title: Fuses HARD soldered to control board
customer_reviews.text: Initially, liked unit. Although pods are $$. You can see real problem by reading one and two star reviews. When lights, pump and or control panel stop functioning it is usually a matter of a blown fuse. These happened to be soldered to the board with leads from fuse(s). No fuse holder(s) on board. Sooo.... you can't swap out an .80 cent fuse and continue to grow. At this point you will be turned to the DARKSIDE and beg, wail, plead and curse the company for THEIR purposeful intension of engineering design. Decent idea and now the market is wide open for anyone to produce a functional lasting assembly of parts
customer_reviews.author: We BUY it - We REVIEW it

customer_reviews.title: YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I had one for about a year and it was good harvest then suddenly the LED started to flicker. Then gone. I have contacted customer support did not even received a response. I tried to look for a replacement for weeks i couldnt find one. Alast, i have finally accepted my faith and throw the blasted thing out. Gone my $200 hard earned bucks. If you bought this, return it on the 30 day window while you can.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Both units purchased were broken or nonfunctional on reciept
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two Bounty Elites as presents for my daughter. I am not sure who checked out the units for resale as used but both arrived with issues. One has a broken clip for the light post and the other has a nonfunctioning electrical system as both the control panel and the lights do not come on when plugged in. I have two Harvest units and have had no issues with them and I love the Aero-gardens I have. I will update this when I discover if the units will be replaced easily or if the USED means we don't make sure they are working and it is a caveat emptor response.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Fast = Slow = Not at All
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 9 pod unit & only 7 germinated. No chives & curly parsley had 2 starter leaves then died. Sadly that was $$ lost. Dill, thyme, Italian parsley & mint are slower growers but are coming up. Herbs that did best are Thai basil & 2 Genovese basil, but they grow EZ & fast. Basil cuttings root in jar of water & I put in Aerogarden. Overhead light also helps other plants close by. Would recommend purchase if $$$ is not an issue and you use a lot of fresh herbs for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Dance

customer_reviews.title: Grow anything from seeds with this!  Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I was selling my house and some potential buyers saw it and were more interested in what I was growing than the house. The product works perfectly. I have absolutely no complaints. It does everything they say it'll do. I purchased the 50 pod grow tray and started with outdoor plants at the beginning of spring and then transplanted everything outdoors into pots on my deck. Then, I moved on to growing herbs and.... boy did they GROW! I ended up gifting the plants to my sister and neighbors that like to cook with fresh herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Lewis

customer_reviews.title: great for dill and basil....other herbs--not so much
customer_reviews.text: If you love basil and dill, go for it. Unfortunately, I was hoping for more parsley and mint. The mint, after 40 days is finally starting to be more than a single sprig. The two types of parsley, remain single sprigs. The basil and dill, on the other hand, are thriving. More dill than I know what to do with!
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly I feel like a farmer!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this was easy to assemble. Planting my herb pots was a breeze. Maintenance of my herb garden could not be easier with the easy to read reminders on the LCD screen. Six weeks in my only 2 gripes are that this starter kit comes with 3 basil pods (2 Genovese, and 1 Thai basil). I would have preferred a little more variety...maybe some sage and rosemary. There really is only so much you can do with that much basil...Secondly, the thyme is so sparse, there is nothing to trim. However, all of my seeds did germinate and I'm using my fresh herbs in everything.
customer_reviews.author: J Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Seed pods did not grow
customer_reviews.text: Followed direction to a tee and seed pods did not grow. Tried calling customer care several times waited 35 minutes to 40 minutes on hold no one ever picked up.
customer_reviews.author: william mclean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn AeroGarden
customer_reviews.text: I love it but realize I don't need 9 herbs.. LOL My favorite is Basil. I can't keep up with all those herbs. I should have bought three-pod machine... two for basil and one for chives. I will use this machine for flowers. It works beautifully so far. I have it over 100 days now.
customer_reviews.author: CookieToddo

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lettuce making machine! Super cool.
customer_reviews.text: Lettuce making machine! You really don’t have to have a green thumb if you can follow simple instructions. This thing tells you everything you need to do. I am a Head Grower of a 85 acre commercial greenhouse as a profession I know plants and systems. I really enjoy this machine. The seeds that come with these are poor quality in my opinion. Buy your seed from a reputable source and buy the blank kit pods and off to races you go. Super cool concept that fundamentally does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Plant food leaked during shipment
customer_reviews.text: My AeroGarden arrived today and I was so excited to get started. However, when I opened the box, I found that the plant food had leaked during shipment. The entire seed pod kit was covered and gross. Most of the plant food is gone and I'm not sure if the seeds will grow since they were wet. I will be happy to update this review if the company will contact me about a replacement seed pod kit so I can get started with the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Love my aerogarden!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received came broken. The LCD screen was all cracked so I had to return it. My return was shipped before I even sent the broken one back so I was super happy. Second one that came in was perfect and I have a huge herb garden now. I could not recommend this more for somebody that wants to grow herbs they can use for cooking and making drinks
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Followed the 5 step instructions per verbatim, several times and the LCD screen does not turn on. There is no master OFF/ON switch, so apparently if it doesn't turn on when it's plugged in, it will never turn on. What level of QA is done before these are shipped out? Apparently none. Now I get to play the customer support game with a $200 gigantic brick, can't wait for the barrel of monkeys this will be.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I’ve ever purchased for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best thing I’ve ever bought for my kitchen. I kill every plant I have ever brought into my home. This is so simple. And look at the results. I was skeptical but it is amazing what you can grow with this! Look at my pics. This was in just about 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous machine
customer_reviews.text: Aerogarden makes gardening so easy, that I have been filled with the confidence that I could grow anything. I have now bought everything I need to grow potatoes in a sack in my spare bedroom and a dutch bucket system to grow large tomatoes and carrots. It's so much research to figure out how to grow things. Farmers are amazingly good at their job to be able to do this. This one little machine started an avalanche of purchases to grow food inside the house. Great machine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Doke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the smaller one, this one is 2 - 3 times faster growing time. Bigger is better, 20 watts vs 45 watts. Mega improvements over the smaller one, brighter indeed.
customer_reviews.author: DjMuzik

customer_reviews.title: This was awesome! My husband hated it
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome! My husband hated it. It does take up a lot of counter space. It grew a ton of Dill, one of the Basil plants, and my own cilantro. The mint and one of the basil's didn't grow at all really, the parsley and chive barely grew and I replaced the Thyme with the Cilantro. The mint at least sprouted so I knew it was there. But never got any further. Both the mint and failed basil got moldy after a few weeks of not thriving. The Dill, other Basil and Cilantro grew like mad. I had plenty and used a ton, gave some away, and still ended up having to toss some.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor mini garden, and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where it is hard to maintain a garden due to the weather and the summer heat. I wanted the Aerogarden mainly to grow romaine, so I no longer have to worry about recalls, and I can always have a fresh supply for salads. The unit was extremely easy to set up. The directions were very clear. It was easy to change the settings (such as for the hours at night that the lights would be off). I set it up about a week ago, and I can see little romaine plants already starting to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. We get about a good harvest every 3 days that can feed 2 adults salads or 3 smaller salads. The salad greens grow pretty fast, and once they are full grown, they grow far faster than in your garden. Sucks up a ton of water, but no bugs to deal with, and no soil to have to wash thoroughly. Love this unit. Certainly not worth the full price, but keep looking for sale and you'll be getting your money's worth and more. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JBP

customer_reviews.title: Works well... Fun... However...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Fun to grow our own herbs. I have two issues. The first is when you expand the hood upward, the power connection to the hood easily pulls loose, resetting the controller. No matter which power outage option you select on the controller it resets the "add nutrients" counter to 14 days. The other issue is the support they provide for taller plants was not designed very well. It is flimsy and installs up too high on the hood support. The plants grow well and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MRO

customer_reviews.title: Great idea bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Broken touchscreen. I thought it was accident during shipping, but based on other reviews I can say it is a cheap quality touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Jasim Mohammed Jabir

customer_reviews.title: Things are not growing, but it is fun
customer_reviews.text: We have been running the garden since the day we got it. Somethings, like the basil and lettuce, have been great. However, the parsely and the chives are a disaster. Started good, died before we could get anything from them. We have one tomatoe plant going. Showing good signs, but no harvest yet. It has been fun. We enjoy watching the plants grow. I don't like how hard it is go fill. Pouring water into the small hole i cannot even tell if it is full or about to overflow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will last less than two years, but it’s ok, you can buy a new one then.
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright. The lights (for which replacements cost as much as the unit about $170) are expected to last less than two years. So if all you’re expecting is two years of growth, then you won’t mind the flashing lights of a failing unit less than two years in, and you’ll be happy to order another one for the next two years to keep aerogarden in business. I mean, I was lucky to have it last longer than the one year manufacturer’s warranty, right? So lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Jolya

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me, the Extra *will* suit your needs better
customer_reviews.text: For my needs, the Extra is an infinitely better unit; however, I may give this to one of my friends or family who's just starting to grow indoors. I currently own this (an Ultra) and an Extra and am considering getting one or two more Extras. It's not even about cost savings, the Extra is just much better in my particular use case. I'll add that the LED's aren't terribly bright (not that I expected bright, radiating LED's, but it's worth noting) and the LCD panel never turns off and is pretty bright itself. The whole interactive controls were nice at first but can complicate things when you just want to do something simple.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kory Woods

customer_reviews.title: top gift suggestion
customer_reviews.text: this is such a neat gadget and what a wonderful gift. My wife sort of liked it when I gave it to her, it sat in the box for a while, but once she finally opened it and set it up, she has become obsessed. it's her new favorite toy. she wants to get the larger farm unit to start growing more and more. it's also a quite beautiful product line- so it's not only a functional / useful product, but also decorative. a terrific invention!
customer_reviews.author: mike higgins

customer_reviews.title: This Garden Isn't Very Rosey Won't Make Good Compost Either
customer_reviews.text: Initially this looked like a good purchase, but some of the plants never germinated. I connected Aerogarden and they blew me off say it was too soon. I'd waited as long as the instructions told me to wait. Right now only THREE of the initial seven plants are growing and providing anything. The others either didn't take, etc. I'd watched this product for longer than I can remember and I finally caved in and tried one. I regret that. There is no magic here and it's not any easier than planting outside. It probably needs more than they really advertise to be successful. I wish I hadn't bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Overly Taxed

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t recommend this enough! We absolutely love our AeroGarden! Have had it for over a year now and it grows our herbs, peppers, salad, and spices fantastically! So easy to use! The reminders keep the water level and nutrients up to date!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to hydroponics and provides fresh herbs in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so far. Setup is dead simple, a 3rd grader could operate this...And I'm not talking about a 3rd grader in the gifted and talented track, I'm talking about a 3rd grader who still grasps his pencil with his entire palm when he writes. It's that easy to use. The light is powerful enough for herbs you use every day and thanks to it being hydroponic you will have rapid growth that will impress you and keep you well stocked with fresh home grown food.
customer_reviews.author: N. Creel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Had nothing but success with the Aerogarden products. Everything weve grown has done well. You will occasionally run into a pod that doesnt sprout. We just throw a seed of something else or similar in there. Kinda neat to see what ya can get to grow.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN KRAFT

customer_reviews.title: I like how the light is bright
customer_reviews.text: I like how the light is bright, easy to set up and easy to maintain. My issue is half the pods did not grow. This happened with another friend who bought this product from Kohl's. She ended up keeping her Click and Grow because she had planted both at the same time and her other product, Click and Grow, grew taller, healthier looking herbs. She returned her Miracle Gro
customer_reviews.author: Celtdragon

customer_reviews.title: and it's fun and exciting to watch them grow so quickly and ...
customer_reviews.text: The plants have grown very fast, and it's fun and exciting to watch them grow so quickly and see the progress every day. Took about a week for it to sprout and once it does it starts growing like crazy. We are still in our first little harvest and will try to grow our own seeds next time. Very easy to use, tells you when to add water or nutrients and has a lot of tips and options on the LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: very few simple instructions to assemble, however for the price, it's very pleasing and rewarding.
customer_reviews.text: Great table top hydroponic grow garden... very easy follow instructions, and if you aren't new to gardening , and growing hydroponic veggies and herbs, I believe you will greatly appreciate this product... If you are new to this, then this will definitly up your game , and you wil ll be greatly pleased with easy to follow instructions and assembly, and ecstatic with the yeild results. all from your table or kitchen counter top at home! definitly a great investment, for the new, novice, and experienced growers. I love the digital display, and light timer / self watering system... has a lot of great tips as well to get you along with your garden.
customer_reviews.author: David GMan

customer_reviews.title: Hoping to grow some salad in quarantine
customer_reviews.text: This unit only came with herb grow pods, so I bought some of the "grow anything" pods. I started one of the basil pods that came with the unit, but I also bought some patio-style tomato seeds and lettuce seeds from Amazon. I've had 100% germination from everything in a few days. I also bought some patio pepper seeds from another site. They haven't germinated yet, but I know from personal experience, that peppers can take about 3 weeks to germinate. All the plants that have germinated are looking good after a couple of weeks so I would definitely recommend this product. It's definitely worth it for anyone to be a little more self-sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: No Herb seed pot kit in package
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the aerogarden in a timly manner. Everything looks good except there was no Herb seed pod kit in the box. Edit: I contacted Aerogarden's support and was promptly informed that they would send a kit separatly. Looking forward to get going! Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Oskar Winqvist

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and functions as expected. Has been set up for about 5 days and already seeing some sprouts popping up. The included seed kit was packaged without the plastic germination covers from the factory, however I went to the nearest Wal-Mart and just picked up a package of 50 condiment containers for $3.00 from the disposable plate section and they perform the exact same function as the $20. 50 pack dome kit from miracle grow. From what I've seen so far do not expect too much in the way of quality control as far as the seed kits are concerned but the unit itself appears to be of quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the non-gardener like myself
customer_reviews.text: As an avid amateur chef I tried several times to start my own herb garden and I never had any luck. When I found this product on the Internet I thought it might be the solution to my gardening failures. Sure enough. I have had this unit now for thirty days and it is producing an abundance of fresh herbs. I just bought a second unit for cherry tomatoes. I am really looking forward to adding fresh tomatoes to my future dishes. I have attached a photo of my AeroGarden after 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Bagne

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it since the light was intermittent.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great. I might buy one down the road, but the overhead light was intermittent (flickered on occasion) so I returned it. I know others who love theirs, and these units are very good for fresh herbs, especially basil. My sister has one and the basil grows like a weed! The unit is quiet and does require adding water daily. The growing guide shows that growing herbs couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, science rocks... Would be great on Mars.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works like a champ. Bought this as a mother's day gift, sat in the box a couple weeks before getting to it. Slapped it together with minimal fuss, she popped the pods and about 3-4 weeks everything is growing great. Honestly, it's a fun science gimmick... it teaches you nothing about really growing stuff but we have plenty of that around the property. I just like how it's minimal care and I have herbs for taco night. 🌮
customer_reviews.author: David Turner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!! Works great, my herbs are growing like crazy!!!! My dill unfortunately died, but 1 out of 9 isn't too bad. We have had a couple of electricity outages over the past few months and no issues at all. I just had to set the time again and it picked up right off of where it left of. My basil is growing like crazy and now the leaves (mainly the top ones) are dying... not sure why. I have moved the light up higher in case it's somehow burning them, but so far it's not getting better. The Aerogarden itself works perfectly though and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Water level warning doesn't work-fixed
customer_reviews.text: It is growing plants well... but it runs dry without ever warning about water levels. It warns when it is time to add nutrients, but no beep and no red light when out of water, somehow it keeps thinking there is water in it. I'm assuming it is a bad sensor. I don't really want to send it back... that will kill my plants that are growing Contacted the company and fixed the problem. The float was not free to fall as the water level decreased. It was an easy fix and I'm embarrassed I didn't check that, but since it didn't ever work I assumed it came defective...
customer_reviews.author: J.  Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Item came defective
customer_reviews.text: I set everything up according to the instructions and as soon as I plugged the unit in, it began power cycling as shown in the video. After about 30 seconds, the unit began to smoke. Come on now, AeroGarden. I contacted Amazon and I'm receiving a replacement unit so I'll update my review at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ho

customer_reviews.title: All green, all good.
customer_reviews.text: I am not easy to impress - but this unit is very impressive!! Seeds germinated in about half the time I expected. Programming is a snap and maintaining the unit is easy enough with water and nutrient changes every 14 days. It IS very, VERY bright. Puts out only a small amount of heat. Why only 4 stars? I want to see how it plays out its first season. I expect it to be great, but we'll see. So far, it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Basil and Dill growing like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally setup my AreroGarden and it's been almost 30 days. Everything has sprouted except the cilantro so not sure if it's just a bad pod that was sent.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: First batch worked fine...
customer_reviews.text: Grew tomatoes, basil, and a lot of cilantro the first batch, and now I cant get anything to even sprout. Obviously I'm not doing anything wrong, since the first batch grew fine (and I'm following the instructions exactly)... and even to eliminate the possibility (after a month of no sprouting), I cleaned the entire unit inside and out. Still nothing. I'm using Aerogarden pre made pods too, so it cant be my seeds or incompetence... what gives? Clearly these arent meant to be one shot growers! However, if that's all I can base my review on, then it obviously has to be a negative review. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: olau

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second AG and I love both of them! The other is the AG ultra with the three CFL bulbs. These things are amazing and easy to use! I get my plants started early and usually have the first pumpkins, cucumbers, tomatoes, and sunflowers in the neighborhood! I highly recommend! UPDATE 7/8/15: After much use of each, I find that this particular LED AG outgrows the regular AG as they advertise. I use this one for lettuce after starting my outside plants. The lettuce is amazing and so fresh. It's like nothing you can buy in the store. I may purchase a third AG if they go on sale again!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Live this aero garden so much I bought one for my daughter and she loved it. I’ve grown herbs in it and started lettuce plants in it which I eventually replanted outside. Last fall I grew peppers in it and had the most wonderful cayenne and poblano peppers. It’s a great source for teaching children (grandchildren) how things grow.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskaborn58

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor as a garden or as a seed started
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact i can either grown plants and herbs inside in this or take the items out after they have grown 6 to 10 inches and plant them outside. I read reviews where someone did not think that would work because they hydroponics is different than soil but i had no issue transfering but i did make sure the soil was very wet when i did so. I even use the light on it to set other plants around it and get the benefit of the grow lights
customer_reviews.author: YesIAmSassy

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had this two months and have done two crops, one herb collection (which have been transplanted to pots) and a 50-pod seed starter. Seeds germinate much faster than in soil and grow much quicker. I haven't had any problems with the units and it's well designed to be easy to clean and set up. I don't think the wi-fi is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SueTom

customer_reviews.title: Love My Aerogarden!
customer_reviews.text: My Aerogarden brightens up a dark corner of my kitchen and gives me a continuous supply of lettuce for sandwiches and small salads. I tried an herb garden, but didn't use enough of the herbs. So now I buy my own lettuce seed mixes and extra peat pods and just grow lettuce. Is it economically feasible? No. It's overpriced. But I love mine and wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: tinycamper

customer_reviews.title: The unit was used until not needed and returned corroded and all accessories used
customer_reviews.text: I am furious. I was so excited to open the box and what I found was a very used and corroded unit with none of the accessories, grow cups, instructions, nothing. I was going to buy the more expensive WiFi version and this arrives. Huge mistake
customer_reviews.author: BenZoh

customer_reviews.title: Aerogarden bounty is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Herbs are growing nicely. Two pods are brand new only for replacing two herbs that we don't use with lettuce and cilantro, which we use alot; so not to be misunderstood for pods that didn't grow. All from the original pack sprouted. My parents' aerogarden is doing even better as they started a little over a week before ours. Just purchasex and attached the grow enhancers, but I feel tinfoil would have done just as well. Anyways, here's a pic of mine, looking good and smells and tastes delicious. :-) Much love for aerogarden.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: AeroGarden, Black Bounty, garden
product_meta.description: Style:BountyMeet the AeroGarden Bounty With gourmet herb seed Pod Kit - grow fresh herbs, vegetables, salad greens, flowers & more. Let your imagination grow wild!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,898 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
